snippet: The festival Film Comment Selects includes 22 movies chosen by the editors of Film Comment magazine.
abstract: A O Scott showcases selections from 2014 Film Comment Selects, annual festival from Film Society of Lincoln Center that includes 22 movies chosen by editors of Film Comment magazine; festival disguises its ambition in matter-of-fact modesty of its title and presents winter-weary New York audiences with grab bag full of oddities and treasures, letting them decide which is which.
lead_paragraph: The festival Film Comment Selects includes 22 movies chosen by the editors of Film Comment magazine.

headline.print_headline: Nothing to See, Yet So Much Not to Miss
headline.seo: Film Comment Selects Festival Offers 22 Intriguing Picks
headline.main: Nothing to See, Yet So Much Not to Miss
